headline: Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) Faces Surge In Shareholder Proposals Ahead Of April Meeting
summary: Coca-Cola (NYSE:KO) has experienced a notable 10.60% price increase over the past quarter, amid a backdrop of shareholder activism and market volatility. Recent proposals from shareholders addressed topics like executive pay and corporate governance, but these were largely recommended against by the company. This shareholder-centric climate coincided with the announcement of Coca-Cola's increased dividend and ongoing share buyback initiatives, potentially signaling confidence to the market...

headline: These 6 Warren Buffett Stocks Are Soaring in 2025 While the Market Is Sinking
summary: "A rising tide lifts all boats," according to an often-cited adage.  Warren Buffett seems to have a knack for finding stocks that perform well when the overall market is performing dismally.  This performance would probably bring a smile to Buffett's long-term business partner, Charlie Munger, who died in late 2023.
